All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AlertBox
Launches a new pop up dialog.
AverageJoe
A monster subclass.
BackButton
A template for creating a new back button.
Battle
A battle contains an inventory of enemy monsters that the player can fight.
BattleInventory
Holds an array of battles with additional functionality.
BattleScreen
Displays the selected battle in a new window.
BattlesScreen
Displays the battle inventory in a new window.
Chunky
A monster subclass.
CommandLine
This class launches the CMD game and manages the player input and written output.
CritPotion
Item that can be used on a monster to increase their crit rate by the given crit amount.
DamagePotion
Item that can be used on a monster to increase their damage by the given damage amount.
Difficulty
Game difficulty levels.
FightScreen
Displays the fight screen for the battle in a new window.
GameEnvironment
The main game manager.
GraphicalUserInterface
This class launches the GUI game and manages the screens.
HealthBar
A template for creating a new health progress bar.
HealthPotion
Item that can be used on a monster to heal them for the given heal amount.
HomeScreen
Displays the home screen in a new window.
InsufficientFundsException
Exception class for catching an insufficient funds error.
InvalidTargetException
Exception class for catching a invalid target error.
InvalidValueException
Exception class for catching an invalid value error.
InventoryFullException
Exception class for catching an inventory full error.
Item
An abstract class that describes an item that can be used on a monster.
ItemButton
A template for creating a new item button.
ItemInventory
Holds an array of items with additional functionality.
ItemScreen
Displays the selected item in a new window.
ItemsPanel
A template for creating a new panel of items.
Lanky
A monster subclass.
LevelPotion
Item that can be used on a monster to level them up to increase their stats.
Monster
An abstract class that describes a monster.
MonsterButton
A template for creating a new monster button.
MonsterInventory
Holds an array of monsters with additional functionality.
MonsterScreen
Displays the selected monster in a new window.
MonstersPanel
A template for creating a new panel of monsters.
NotFoundException
Exception class for catching not found in the inventory error.
Player
Holds information about the player and their inventories.
Purchasable
An interface to that handles purchasable classes such as Monster and Item.
PurchasableLabel
A template for creating a new Purchasable label.
Raka
A monster subclass.
RandomEvent
Handles all random events that happen over night.
Score
Keeps track of the player score and battles won or lost.
SetupScreen
Displays the setup screen in a new window.
Shanny
A monster subclass.
Shop
Holds the shop monsters and items.
ShopScreen
Displays the shop screen in a new window.
SpriteLabel
A template for creating a new sprite label containing an image icon.
StartingMonsterScreen
Displays the starting monster screen in a new window.
StartScreen
Displays the start screen in a new window.
StatMaxedOutException
Exception class for catching a stat already maxed out error.
StatsScreen
Displays the stats screen in a new window.
Turn
Determines the current turn in a battle.
Zap
A monster subclass.
